GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of the requested article

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an object of comments relating to the requested article

comments.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!
comments.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts the comment and it returns an onbject of the posted comment. It receives a body and an article_id. Both article_id and username have to be valid

exampleBody.author: butter_bridge
exampleBody.body: This morning, I showered for nine minutes.

comment.body: This morning, I showered for nine minutes.
comment.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the number of votes for a given article.A positive number increases value and a negative number decreases the value. The votes are provided by an object on a key 'inc_votes'. It responds with the updated article object

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the comment based on the comment_id provided. Returns no content

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users
